Attilla/Shivah/Bat probes/Darkfate::

Darkfate using his computer and bat probes, followed the bots. He 
used his comm link and comunicates with Perndabot (OOc: sorry for the 
spelling). "Darkfate to Perndabot" said the male "Two of my troops 
are following a bot who attack our base, they're close of Alliance's 
base, I'll send the signature of my troops in order to you don't 
shoot them"

he send the signatures of Shivah and Attilla, while he send a secret 
menssage to them.

Attilla and Shivah guessed Slayer's play and they (with the probes)
spread in several direcctions while them increased the speed. They 
started to shot against Slayer again

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Slayer::
> 
> Slayer's face broke into an evil smile as he continues to fly 
toward 
> the Alliance base. From what he had read from the Trainers' 
computer, 
> the Alliance seemed to be the strongest faction on the planet. 
Since 
> the Trainers had attacked it, he knew what the base was capable of. 
> The bots trailing him probably didn't.
> 
> "Let's play follow the leader..." he says to himself, speeding up.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Attilla/Luzbel/bat-probes::
> > 
> > They stubborly continued following Slayer
